description:
A whistle-stop tour of the 40+ modules on CPAN that you can use to export symbols from, or import symbols to, your packages.

What are the main features of exporter modules, and what things should you consider when writing a function-exporting module?
short_description: A whistle-stop tour of the 40+ modules on CPAN that you can use to export symbols from, or import symbols to, your packages. Wha
title: LPW2014 Neil Bowers   ‎A review of Exporter modules‎ mp4 ff
